entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
